use_case: Complete lead capture and nurturing system for pressure washing businesses
target_audience: Pressure washing business owners, home service contractors
author: Josh Wash / BroBro

description.overview: A comprehensive lead generation snapshot designed specifically for pressure washing businesses. Includes proven funnels, automated follow-up sequences, and appointment booking workflows that convert more leads into paying customers. Built on industry best practices and optimized for local service businesses.
key_benefits: Automated lead capture from Facebook ads, Google ads, and website traffic
Multi-channel follow-up sequences (email, SMS, voicemail drops)
Appointment booking automation with reminder sequences
Pipeline for tracking leads from inquiry to completed job
Pre-built service request forms optimized for pressure washing quotes
ideal_for: Pressure washing companies looking to automate lead follow-up
New businesses needing a proven lead generation system
Established companies wanting to scale their operations
Home service contractors expanding into pressure washing

prerequisites: GHL account with SMS and email capabilities
Business phone number connected to GHL
Twilio or Mailgun integration for email/SMS
import_steps: Step 1: Import the snapshot into your sub-account
Step 2: Review and activate all workflows (they import as drafts)
Step 3: Update custom values (business name, phone, address, service areas)
Step 4: Configure calendar availability and booking settings
Step 5: Update email and SMS templates with your branding
post_import_configuration: Task 1: Connect your Twilio phone number for SMS
Task 2: Set up email domain authentication (SPF/DKIM)
Task 3: Add your logo and brand colors to all funnels
Task 4: Test all workflows by submitting test leads
Task 5: Configure pipeline notifications for your team
Task 6: Set up Facebook and Google ad integrations
important_notes: All workflows import as DRAFT - you must activate them manually
Update custom values before activating workflows to avoid sending test data
Test the entire flow with a real phone number before going live
Configure your calendar hours to match your service availability
Review all email/SMS templates for tone and branding consistency

quick_customizations: Replace logo in funnel pages (use 300x100px transparent PNG)
Update business name in all templates (use Find & Replace)
Change primary color scheme to match your brand
Modify SMS response times based on your availability
advanced_customizations: Add more service types to quote form dropdown
Create separate workflows for commercial vs residential leads
Integrate with your existing CRM or accounting software
Add seasonal services (gutter cleaning, window washing) with new funnels
Implement dynamic pricing based on property size
branding_checklist: Business phone number in all SMS templates
Service area names updated in SEO pages

best_practices: Respond to leads within 5 minutes - speed is critical for local services
Use SMS as primary communication channel (higher open rates than email)
Include before/after photos in follow-up emails to build trust
Offer limited-time discounts to create urgency
Request reviews immediately after service completion (within 1 hour)
Track lead source to optimize your marketing spend
Use voicemail drops for efficient follow-up at scale
Segment leads by service type for more relevant follow-up
A/B test different quote response times to find optimal conversion

common_use_cases.scenario: New lead from Facebook ad clicks 'Get Instant Quote'
tips: Immediate SMS builds trust and sets expectations
Follow up with email containing social proof within 2 hours
If no response in 24 hours, offer a limited-time discount

common_use_cases.scenario: Lead books appointment but hasn't confirmed
tips: Send confirmation immediately to reduce buyer's remorse
2-hour reminder with tech info personalizes the experience

common_use_cases.scenario: Lead received quote but hasn't booked
tips: Don't give up too soon - leads may need service later
Seasonal promotions work great for re-engagement
Offer added value (free gutter cleaning with house wash)

integrations_required.purpose: Send SMS and make phone calls for lead follow-up
Send marketing emails with high deliverability
Automatically import leads from Facebook ads
Capture leads from Google LSA platform
